description.inventoryweight.client.someS: A client-side setting that affects the inventory weight mod.
description.inventoryweight.server.bucke: Defines the weight of each bucket in the inventory.
description.inventoryweight.server.bottl: Defines the weight of each bottle in the inventory.
description.inventoryweight.server.block: Defines the weight of each block in the inventory.
description.inventoryweight.server.ingot: Defines the weight of each ingot in the inventory.
description.inventoryweight.server.nugge: Defines the weight of each nugget in the inventory.
description.inventoryweight.server.items: Defines the default weight for general items in the inventory.
description.inventoryweight.server.maxWe: The maximum total weight that an inventory can hold.
